timeline.message: [OC-1217] Backend : Create/update processesStatesNotNotified in database, via endpoint PUT /users/{login}/settings

timeline.bodyText: i do not understand the use of this object
timeline.author: freddidierRTE
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -216,6 +232,15 @@ definitions:
         type: string
       rights:
         $ref: '#/definitions/RightsEnum'
+  NotificationFilter:
+    type: object
+    properties:
+      process:
+        type: string
+      states:
+        type: array
+        items:
+          type: string

timeline.bodyText: Would it be possible to factorize as it is the same object as in user settings
timeline.author: freddidierRTE
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -207,6 +215,14 @@ definitions:
         items:
           $ref: '#/definitions/ComputedPerimeter'
           uniqueItems: true
+      processesStatesNotNotified:
+        type: object
+        description: Filters on processes and states for user feed (exclusion filter)
+        additionalProperties:

+          description: List of process states for which the user will not be notified
+          items:
+            type: string
